name: Happiny
flavorText:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

previous.name: Mime Jr.
previous.flavorText:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

next.name: Chatot
next.flavorText:
It can learn and speak human
words. If they gather, they all
learn the same saying.

pokemon.name: Happiny
pokemon.flavorText:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

pokemon.name: Blissey
pokemon.flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.
